caller_intent: Arlene is seeking clarification and comparison of home and auto insurance options, including pricing, coverage details, and payment plans, to make an informed decision on switching providers.
resolution_steps: Jeremy presents two companies (Auto Owners and National General) for home and auto insurance, comparing full-payment vs. monthly payment plans.
He explains how splitting home and auto policies between companies affects pricing (e.g., Auto Owners for home, National General for auto raises home costs by ~$230/year).
Details coverage specifics: guaranteed replacement cost (HE7), equipment breakdown coverage ($100k), and additional barn coverage ($60k).
Calculates total annual costs for different scenarios (e.g., $3,835.32 for Auto Owners full-pay vs. $2,812 for split policies).
Mentions credit checks, payment methods (credit cards), and arranges follow-up via text for card details once closing costs are secured.
knowledge_required: Insurance pricing structures (full vs. monthly payments)
Coverage terminology (e.g., guaranteed replacement cost, equipment breakdown)
Impact of policy splits on pricing
summary: Jeremy from Alliance Insurance Services provides Arlene with detailed comparisons of home and auto insurance options from Auto Owners and National General, explaining pricing, coverage, and financial implications. He arranges a follow-up to finalize payment details once Arlene is ready, after discussing her property's proximity to Pilot Mountain and her husband's mobility needs.
